messages.title: The Green Belt
messages.content: JAMES CLAPPISON is leading the fight against inappropriate developments on the Green Belt.

messages.title: Education
messages.content: JAMES CLAPPISON has taken up the issue of fairer funding for Hertsmere's underfunded schools.

messages.title: Health
messages.content: JAMES CLAPPISON is fighting for first class health services for Hertsmere.

messages.title: Immigration
messages.content: JAMES CLAPPISON is working for effective control of immigration which benefits Britain's economy.

messages.title: Law and Order
messages.content: JAMES CLAPPISON is standing up for a zero tolerance approach to crime.

messages.title: Europe
messages.content: JAMES CLAPPISON is campaigning for a Britain with more control over its laws, stronger borders and a dynamic trading policy with the whole world.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fights against inappropriate developments on the Green Belt.
Seeks fairer funding for Hertsmere's underfunded schools.
Fighting for first class health services for Hertsmere.
Working for effective control of immigration which benefits Britain's economy.
Standing up for a zero tolerance approach to crime.
Campaigning for a Britain with more control over its laws, stronger borders, and a dynamic trading policy with the whole world.

leaflet.personalStatement: A local man who to choose to live in Hertsmere... A hard working MP... A strong voice for Hertsmere.
